Desciption: 你找到了一些散落的电池。不多，但是能撑一会儿。#You find some batteries left behind.Not many,but these'll last for a while
你找到了一些零件，很幸运其中有一些你能用的#You find some parts, and you're lucky you can use some of them
老化是每个机器人不可避免的过程#Aging is an inevitable process for every robot
Choice1: 我会变成一艘忒修斯之船吗#Will I become a ship of Theseus

Desciption: 你找到了一个包装得很好的电池盒，可惜里面的电池保存得不好#You find a nicely packaged battery case, but the battery inside is not very well preserved
Choice1: 至少它们还有电#At least they have electricity
Choice2: 最好离这些危险品远一点#It's better to stay away from this dangerous stuff

Desciption: 这个小修理站还能工作，如果有能量输入的话#The small repair depot is still operational, if there is an energy input
Choice1: 磨刀不误砍柴工#Whet the knife and cut wood
Choice2: 宝贵的能量应该用来探索#Precious energy should be used for exploration

Desciption: 这座军事级修理站可以轻易修理你，但它所需要的能源也是军事级的#This legacy military repair station can easily repair you, but it also requires military-grade power to start
Choice1: 花费巨大，但值得#The costs are huge, and so are the benefits
Choice2: 我可不是军用机器人#I'm not a military robot

Eventtitle: 变异动物袭击#Mutant animals attack
Desciption: 一群变异动物被你落下的声音惊醒，还把你误认为了入侵者#A group of mutant animals wake up to the sound of your fall, mistaking you for an intruder
Choice1: 把照明设备开到最大来吓退它们#Turn the lights on at full power to scare them away
